channel.title: PulseGeek
channel.description: Tech news, gaming, and geek culture in one pulse

item.title: AI Ethics and Fairness: Practical Paths to Responsible AI
item.description: Practical frameworks for AI ethics and fairness with metrics, governance, data practices, interpretability, monitoring, and incident response.

item.title: What Is Retrieval Augmented Generation Prompting? Context, Grounding, and Limits
item.description: Explore retrieval augmented generation prompting, how it grounds answers with context, where it breaks, and how to operationalize it safely.

item.title: How to Version and Document Prompts: Changelogs, Tests, and Readme Patterns
item.description: Learn how to version and document prompts with changelogs, tests, and READMEs. Build reliable, governed workflows that scale across teams.

item.description: Explore orchestration tools for prompt workflows, including governance, integrations, and evaluation practices to scale safe, consistent outputs.

item.title: Guardrails and Safety Prompts Best Practices: Filters, Policies, and Overrides
item.description: Practical best practices for guardrails and safety prompts, including filters, policies, overrides, and governance across teams.

item.description: Build reusable prompt libraries with clear taxonomy, rich metadata, and governed access to scale consistency and safety across teams.

item.description: Build prompt chaining workflow templates with reusable chains, guardrails, and versioning. Learn tools, libraries, documentation, and RAG integration for safe scale.

item.title: What Is Prompt Leakage and How to Prevent It? Risks, Patterns, and Guardrails
item.description: Learn what prompt leakage is, why it’s risky, common patterns to watch, and practical guardrails to prevent it.
